title: Why I dont want to go to school? - Quora

response.answer_text: Bullies, sucky teachers, time wasted when other students don't have to try and get A’s. The fact cops are now part of school making it easier for kids to gain criminal records. I hope your not a kid , if you are their are virtual homeschools that are free and some provide books and computers.
Is getting up and going to school getting tougher? Then you gotta read this ClickAnd read Softdrink voice
